title: 5:00 PM Rehearsal dinner
details:
@ Lauriol Plaza. R&J's favorite big box mexican food. Come for the swirl margharita, stay for the guac.
1835 18th St NW, Washington, DC 20009

title: 8:00 PM Actual Rehearsal
details:
Come to the Courtland Towers common room for a quick run through of the event.

On the weekends street parking is usually easy to find, but if not you can park for free in the metro lot a block north of Courtland Towers.  Come up the escalators, walk past the lobby, and you'll see the common room on your right.
1200 N Veitch St, Arlington, VA 22201

title: 8:30 PM Coffee & Cake
details:
Also wine! Come hang out the and spend the last night with R&J as Mr and Miss. There'll be some dessert, coffee and good company.

 On the weekends street parking is usually easy to find, but if not you can park for free in the metro lot a block north of Courtland Towers.  Come up the escalators, walk past the lobby, and you'll see the common room on your right.

1200 N Veitch St, Arlington, VA 22201

title: 8:00 AM Hair & Makeup Begins
details: Hair will be done in our hotel rooms at the The Virginian Suites, 1500 Arlington Blvd.  Call Rachel or Justin if you aren't sure where to meet!

title: 2:30 PM To Iwo Jima for photos
details: This is weather dependent. Check with Justin on details for exactly where to meet.

title: 3:00 PM Photos at Iwo Jima
details: It's going to be gorgeous, I swear!

title: 4:30 PM Ketubah signing
details: Ketubah signing at the Virginian Suites.  Check with Justin or Rachel on the location, it will likely be in Rachel's hotel room.

title: 5:30 PM Ceremony room is open
details:
Head to the Top of the Town and take the elevator to the top floor. The adddress is:
1400 14th St N,
Arlington, VA 22209

title: 8:00 PM Dinner is served
details:
EAT!  CONTINUE TO DRINK!

title: 10:45PM Afterparty!
details: Perhaps some more drinking.  I just can't predict the future.  Probably @ Ragtime.  Check with R&J.
